MAN.TITLE: c_scilab
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: converts the file data format from Gnuplot to Scilab

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : the name of the input file.
: the name of the output file.

DESCRIPTION.P: converts the intensity/phase file from gnuplot to scilab data format.

MAN.AUTHOR: Chen jingyuan, IAPCM, China.
